caption: The video tells the story of a veteran who finally got his own mail after a robbery at the post office. The veteran then went to a sunshade in the forest and asked the literate recruit to read the letter to him. As the recruits read, the man's expression was very rich and very excited. It then cuts to night, when a soldier sneaks back into the barracks with a piece of clothing and sniffs it. The soldier beside me also sniffed the clothes he had taken.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, decades ago, now, or in the future?
global.answer: It happens decades ago, most likely during a world war.
